arCallbacks.unk_28bc3c5:
function Start(idActor, idActorDetector)

	--Roina Actor and Loc for Conversation
	idRoina = Hydra.ActorsLinkedByActorInGroup(idActorDetector, "NPC_ROINA")[1]
	locFront = Hydra.ActorsLinkedByActorInGroup(idActorDetector, "NPC_STATIC_LOC")[1]
	locExit = Hydra.ActorsLinkedByActorInGroup(idActorDetector, "NPC_EXIT_LOC")[1]
	
	-- Wight Fight variables
	idWight = Hydra.ActorsLinkedByActorInGroup(idActorDetector, "WIGHT")[1]
	idHairSpawner = Hydra.ActorsLinkedByActorInGroup(idActorDetector, "HAIR_SPAWNER")[1]
	idZombieSpawner = Hydra.ActorsLinkedByActorInGroup(idActorDetector, "ZOMBIE_SPAWNER")[1]
	
	--Roina moves to Wight, commenting
	
	idFollower = Hydra.QuestGetFollowers()[1]
	
	Hydra.ActorEnableAI(idFollower, false)
	Hydra.QuestFollowerTakeOwnership(idFollower)
	Hydra.ActorPlaySimpleConversation(CON_WIGHT_FOUND, idFollower)
	Hydra.QActorMoveToLocationDynamicSpeed(idFollower, locFront, "NPC_Run", true)
	Hydra.QActorFaceSameAsActor(idFollower, locFront)
	Hydra.WaitForConversationFinished(idFollower, CON_WIGHT_FOUND)
	Hydra.WaitForQEmpty(idFollower)
	Hydra.EventSend("WightConversation")
	
end

function Start(sEventName, idActor, nUserParam)

--Enable static Roina
	Hydra.ActorDelete(idFollower)
	Hydra.ActorEnable(idRoina)
	Hydra.QActorEnableAI(idRoina, false)
	Hydra.ActorSetSheathPreference(idRoina, (Hydra.SHEATH_PREF_SHEATHED))
	
end

function Start(idActorNPC, sConversation, idActorPlayer)

--Roina exits
	Hydra.QActorMoveToLocationDynamicSpeed(idRoina, locExit, "NPC_Run", false)
	Hydra.QActorFadeAndDelete(idRoina, 1.0)
	
end

arQuestPhases.unk_9c63f9d:
--Enable Journal 03
Hydra.ActorEnable(ID_JOURNAL)

--Ealda sheath weapon (for Conversation)
Hydra.ActorSetSheathPreference(idRoina, (Hydra.SHEATH_PREF_SHEATHED))

arCallbacks.unk_28bc3c5:
function Start(idActorKiller, idActorKilled)

--Turn off Sodden Growth spawner
	Hydra.ActorGizmoSetDisabled(idHairSpawner, true)

--Turn off Zombie Spawner
	Hydra.ActorGizmoSetDisabled(idZombieSpawner, true)
	for i, idZomb in ipairs(Hydra.ActorsInGroup(GRP_ZOMBIES)) do
		if (Hydra.ActorIsValid(idZomb)) then
			Hydra.ActorKill(idZomb)
		end
	
--Water Wight's final message
	Hydra.ActorPlayDisembodiedConversation(CON_WIGHTWHISPER, idActorKiller)

--Make Roina Follower static for Conversation
	idFollower = Hydra.QuestGetFollowers()[1]

	if Hydra.ActorIsValid(idFollower) then
		Hydra.ActorEnableAI(idFollower, false)
		Hydra.QuestFollowerTakeOwnership(idFollower)
		Hydra.QActorMoveToLocationDynamicSpeed(idFollower, locFront, "NPC_Run", true)
		Hydra.QActorFaceSameAsActor(idFollower, locFront)
		Hydra.WaitForQEmpty(idFollower)
		Hydra.ActorDelete(idFollower)
	end

end

function Start(idActorSpawned, idActorSpawner)
	-- Play a rope effect from the Wight to the spawned actor
	if Hydra.ActorIsValid(idActorSpawned)then
		tRopes[idActorSpawned] = Hydra.ActorPlayEffectGroupActorToActor(idActorSpawned, idWight, S_BLOOD_ROPE, true)
		-- Add 1 Hair Guard.  Player must destroy all active Hair Guards before they're able to kill SoddenEffigy
		idHairGuard = idHairGuard+1
	end
	
	-- set the Wight to invulnerable
	if Hydra.ActorIsValid(idWight) then
		Hydra.ActorSetInvulnerable(idWight, true)
		idWightShield = Hydra.ActorPlayEffectGroup(idWight, S_FX_SHIELD, true)
	end
end

function Start(idActorKiller, idActorKilled)
	-- Remove complex effect (validate)
	if Hydra.ActorIsValid(idActorKilled)then
		idHairGuard = idHairGuard-1
		if Hydra.ActorComplexEffectIsValid(idActorKilled, tRopes[idActorKilled]) then
			Hydra.ActorRemoveComplexEffect(idActorKilled, tRopes[idActorKilled])
		end
	end
	
	if Hydra.ActorIsValid(idWight) then
		if idHairGuard<=0 then
			Hydra.ActorSetInvulnerable(idWight, false)
			if Hydra.ActorComplexEffectIsValid(idWight, idWightShield) then
				Hydra.ActorRemoveComplexEffect(idWight, idWightShield)
			end
		end
	end
end

function Start(idActorNPC, sConversation, idActorPlayer)
	
	-- Enable Rona AI
	Hydra.QActorEnableAI(idRoina, true)
	Hydra.ActorSetSheathPreference(idRoina, (Hydra.SHEATH_PREF_UNSHEATHED))
	
	-- Wight Fight Begins
	Hydra.ActorSetTargetable(idWight, true)
	Hydra.ActorSetNoDamage(idWight, false)
	Hydra.ActorGizmoSetDisabled(idHairSpawner, false)
	Hydra.ActorGizmoSetDisabled(idZombieSpawner, false)
end
